model.description: The attachment depth.
model.name: attachmentdepth

model.name: attachmentparentid

model.name: containsattachment

model.name: date

model.description: The filename of the document
model.name: filename

model.description: The type of the document
model.name: filetype

model.description: The date at which the document was indexed
model.name: indexeddate

model.description: Present if the document is an attachment of another document
model.name: isattachment

model.description: Present if the document is a record of another document
model.name: isrecord

model.description: Present if the document is a reference on a document
model.name: isreference

model.name: openwithquickview

model.name: source

model.description: The title of the document
model.name: title

model.description: The identifier of the top parent
model.name: topparent

model.description: The identifier of the top parent document, for parent/child relationship.

model.name: transactionid

model.description: The URI of the document
model.name: uri

model.name: urihash
